channel.title: Compiler error please help
channel.description:
ok so i read through the compile error thread and it was really helpful at sorting out the 100 errors because i had the wrong compile code but i fixed that and ive got the correct jdk or so i think but i still ger this error but it says it has compiled it but it hasnt... please help :/
javac: file not found: .\src\*.java usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue...

ok so i read through the compile error thread and it was really helpful at sorting out the 100 errors because i had the wrong compile code but i fixed that and ive got the correct jdk or so i think but i still ger this error but it says it has compiled it but it hasnt… please help
